page.title: 06INDUSTRY
page.content: There is very little industry in this area.Most residents commute to the nearby towns of Matlock,Chesterfield and Sheffield.The Milltown Claycross Iron and Foundries Company used to mine fluorspar.The company now uses the site as a flotation plant where fluorspar and barytes from elsewhere,including parts of Derbyshire,are brought in and processed.The minerals are then sold to other companies.Only a few people are employed at this plant. We were told that there are still a few uncapped shafts from lead-mining days. One mineral works closed in recent years and the offices converted into houses.
